title: OmniMind-Core-Papers: Artificial Consciousness System Research Core
description: Public research core of OmniMind system (Sovereign Phase 2.0) containing reproducible implementations of 4 peer-reviewed papers on computational psychoanalysis, quantum consciousness, decolonial theory, and AI ethics. Includes 15+ ingested EEG/Quantum datasets (Ketamine, Schizophrenia, Meditation), 230+ tests with 90%+ code coverage. MIT-licensed code, CC BY 4.0 documentation.
